column4: I really need help with my sound, plz help. I did all this http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=26567&highlight=sound stil not working
what precisely?
need more information
thanks, but next time please use #flood
cat /proc/asound/version -> #flood
you need a newer version of alsa-driver, for starters
do you have the universe repo enabled?
wiki.ubuntu.com/UniversePackages
let me know when you've set up that
in #flood, grep universe /etc/apt/sources.list
sec, I'm trying to do multiple things
yes, it's enabled.
now, sudo aptitude install build-essential linux-headers-$(uname -r) alsa-source
you must have (an)other package manager[ frontend] s open
make sure you've closed Synaptic, dselect, etc.
any progress?
cd /usr/src && sudo tar xfj alsa-driver.tar.bz2 && sudo dpkg-reconfigure alsa-source
then choose "no" for PnP, "yes" for debug, and the atiixp (not the atiixp modem, though!) driver
then, cd modules/alsa-driver && sudo debian/rules binary_modules KSRC=/usr/src/linux-headers-$(uname -r) KVERS=$(uname -r)
then just dpkg-reconfigure it
make sure unrar-nonfree is installed
